moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 c6 3. Nc3 e6 4. e4: !? White is trying to get a quick attack going.
moves.4... dxe4 5. Nxe4 Bb4+ 6. Bd2 Qxd4: ?! It is very risky to take the pawn, since White gets a ferocious attack.
moves.7. Bxb4 Qxe4+ 8. Be2 Nf6: ?? A fatal blunder, but Black is under tremendous pressure.
moves.9... Ng8: ? A forced mate follows, but even after the better ...Nd5 White wins the N and retains a strong attack.

gameName: Falling for Trap in the Slav
